body.codeblock: <section xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.7"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="894668463"/> <code code="67537-1" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="EMS Protocol Section"/> <title>EMS Protocol Section</title> <text/> <entry> <observation moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.93"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="832540513"/> <code code="67537-1" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="EMS protocol"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> <entryRelationship> <observation/> </entryRelationship> </observation> </entry> <entry> <observation moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.94"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="491788748"/> <code code="67553-8" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="EMS candidate patient registry"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </entry> </section>
